programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Jarrod and Brandi have fun as they try to dunk the competition; Casey tries her hand at bidding; Ivy turns his store into an auction house.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders travel to Hawaiian Gardens, Calif.; Barry brings along an inside man; Jarrod empties his wallet to fill the store.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The bidders look to strike it big in Long Beach, Calif.; Jarrod shows up just in time to judge Brandi's buy; Darrell and Brandon's purchase could brew up a tidy profit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers seek industrial merchandise and antiques; a wine rack intrigues Jarrod and Brandi; Dave and Barry put their knowledge of oddities to the test.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers journey to the affluent neighborhood of Westminster, Calif.; Barry discovers an antique medical device.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Barry unleashes a secret weapon; Dave and Darrell battle over a $20,000 locker; Jarrod and Brandi bicker over a questionable purchase.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Lakewood, Calif., Darrell and Brandon buy a locker fit for a fiesta; Dave acts like a bully; Barry pays a price for his locker addiction.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Ricky and Bubba buy some objects for cattle; Jenny tries to get antique furniture; Victor appraises motorcycle gear; Moe and Mary find an object that may have been built by Benjamin Franklin.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.sub-title: The Good, the Bad, and the Hungry
programme.desc: A deceased tycoon's unit goes up for sale; antique kitchen gear; soaring highs and crushing lows greet the bidders.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Jenny squares off against Ricky and Bubba in Arlington; Moe and Mary discover sweet music; Victor goes under cover and winds up with a 1970s relic.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The buyers compete with a swarm of bidders; power tools and antique clocks await the winners.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.sub-title: Take a Deep Breath, It's Lesa!
programme.desc: An old adversary pops up in the Houston suburb of Conroe; Moe and Mary feel the pressure; Ricky and Bubba try to profit from paranoia.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The bidders endure a round of severe weather in Mineral Wells; Ricky and Bubba score football items; Jenny's locker brings her joy; Moe and Mary visit a cattle farm.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Moe's protegee, Mary Padian, gives new buyer Jenny Grumbles a run for her money; Ricky learns a lesson in human anatomy; Bubba seeks a buyer for his explicit art.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The buyers head to a Fort Worth, Texas, facility known for its deceptively bad-looking lockers; Lesa Lewis seeks value in an old cookie jar; Moe Prigoff hopes to rebound after missing Walt's auction.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.sub-title: The Surgeon, the Witch, and the Wardrobe
programme.desc: The buyers nab lockers as a tornado approaches; two bidders band together in the name of profit.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The buyers seek antiques in the city of DeSoto; a new face from across the pond challenges Ricky and Bubba; David learns how sausage is made; Jenny gives Mary a lift.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The buyers head to the Texas resort town of Mineral Wells; Ricky and Bubba battle Victor for a luxury locker; a classic lighter could be worth a small fortune.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Moe and Mary meet a qualified wood expert in the Texas town of Waxahachie; Ricky and Bubba find a strange weapon; a buyer listens to the locals to get an edge up on the competition.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Moe and Mary fight for an antique unit worth thousands; Jenny learns about rock 'n' roll; Ricky and Bubba take out the tourist competition.

programme.desc: The buyers visit the city of Mesquite on one of the hottest days of the year; Vic's protege takes a hit; Mary's discovery leads her to a llama farm.
